label: GitHub Webhook
name: GitHubWebhook
description: Start workflow whenever a GitHub webhook event occurs

options.label: Branch Protection Rule
options.name: branch_protection_rule
options.description: Activity related to a branch protection rule.

options.label: Check Run
options.name: check_run
options.description: Check run activity has occurred.

options.label: Check Suite
options.name: check_suite
options.description: Check suite activity has occurred.

options.label: Code Scanning Alert
options.name: code_scanning_alert
options.description: Activity related to code scanning alerts in a repository.

options.label: Commit Comment
options.name: commit_comment
options.description: A commit comment is created.

options.label: Create
options.name: create
options.description: A Git branch or tag is created.

options.label: Delete
options.name: delete
options.description: A Git branch or tag is deleted.

options.label: Dependabot Alert
options.name: dependabot_alert
options.description: Activity related to Dependabot alerts.

options.label: Deploy Key
options.name: deploy_key
options.description: A deploy key is added or removed from a repository.

options.label: Deployment
options.name: deployment
options.description: A deployment is created.

options.label: Deployment Status
options.name: deployment_status
options.description: A deployment status is created.

options.label: Discussion
options.name: discussion
options.description: Activity related to a discussion.

options.label: Discussion Comment
options.name: discussion_comment
options.description: Activity related to a comment in a discussion.

options.label: Fork
options.name: fork
options.description: A user forks a repository.

options.label: GitHub App Authorization
options.name: github_app_authorization
options.description: When someone revokes their authorization of a GitHub App, this event occurs.

options.label: Gollum
options.name: gollum
options.description: A wiki page is created or updated.

options.label: Installation
options.name: installation
options.description: Activity related to a GitHub App installation.

options.label: Installation Repositories
options.name: installation_repositories
options.description: Activity related to repositories being added to a GitHub App installation.

options.label: Issue Comment
options.name: issue_comment
options.description: Activity related to an issue or pull request comment.

options.label: Issues
options.name: issues
options.description: Activity related to an issue.

options.label: Label
options.name: label
options.description: Activity related to a label.

options.label: Marketplace Purchase
options.name: marketplace_purchase
options.description: Activity related to a GitHub Marketplace purchase.

options.label: Member
options.name: member
options.description: Activity related to repository collaborators.

options.label: Membership
options.name: membership
options.description: Activity related to team membership.

options.label: Merge Group
options.name: merge_group
options.description: Activity related to merge groups in a merge queue.

options.label: Meta
options.name: meta
options.description: The webhook this event is configured on was deleted.

options.label: Milestone
options.name: milestone
options.description: Activity related to milestones.

options.label: Organization
options.name: organization
options.description: Activity related to an organization and its members.

options.label: Org Block
options.name: org_block
options.description: Activity related to people being blocked in an organization.

options.label: Package
options.name: package
options.description: Activity related to GitHub Packages.

options.label: Page Build
options.name: page_build
options.description: Represents an attempted build of a GitHub Pages site.

options.label: Ping
options.name: ping
options.description: When you create a new webhook, we send you a simple ping event to let you know you have set up the webhook correctly.

options.label: Project
options.name: project
options.description: Activity related to classic projects.

options.label: Project Card
options.name: project_card
options.description: Activity related to cards in a classic project.

options.label: Project Column
options.name: project_column
options.description: Activity related to columns in a classic project.

options.label: Projects V2 Item
options.name: projects_v2_item
options.description: Activity related to items in a project.

options.label: Public
options.name: public
options.description: When a private repository is made public.

options.label: Pull Request
options.name: pull_request
options.description: Activity related to pull requests.

options.label: Pull Request Review
options.name: pull_request_review
options.description: Activity related to pull request reviews.

options.label: Pull Request Review Comment
options.name: pull_request_review_comment
options.description: Activity related to pull request review comments in the pull request unified diff.

options.label: Pull Request Review Thread
options.name: pull_request_review_thread
options.description: Activity related to a comment thread on a pull request being marked as resolved or unresolved.

options.label: Push
options.name: push
options.description: Activity related to one or more commits pushed to a repository branch or tag.

options.label: Release
options.name: release
options.description: Activity related to a release.

options.label: Repository Dispatch
options.name: repository_dispatch
options.description: Occurs when a GitHub App sends a POST request to the 'Create a repository dispatch event' endpoint.

options.label: Repository
options.name: repository
options.description: Activity related to a repository.

options.label: Repository Import
options.name: repository_import
options.description: Activity related to a repository being imported to GitHub.

options.label: Repository Vulnerability Alert
options.name: repository_vulnerability_alert
options.description: Activity related to security vulnerability alerts in a repository.

options.label: Security Advisory
options.name: security_advisory
options.description: Activity related to a security advisory reviewed by GitHub.

options.label: Sponsorship
options.name: sponsorship
options.description: Activity related to a sponsorship listing.

inputParameters.name: webhookSecret
inputParameters.description: The secret used to validate GitHub webhook requests.
